name: community-toolkit
description: Guidance for .NET Community Toolkit libraries including MVVM Toolkit, Diagnostics, and HighPerformance. USE FOR: MVVM source-generated view models, observable properties, relay commands, messenger pattern, guard clauses, high-performance array pooling, string pooling. DO NOT USE FOR: UI framework specifics (use WPF/MAUI/WinUI skills), full reactive programming (use Rx), dependency injection container logic.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick

references.title: .NET Community Toolkit Documentation on Microsoft Learn
